TEXT.TITLE: MITSUBISHI UNIT TO SUPPLY CELLULAR TELEPHONE SYSTEMS
TEXT.BODY: ASTRONET Corp, which is jointly owned by <Mitsubishi Corp> and <Stromberg-Carlson Corp> said it entered into three separate agreements to supply cellular telephone systems in Roanoke, Va.; Montgomery, Ala.; and San Angelo, Texas. Reuter
